title: Banksy Unveils Mural in War-Torn Ukrainian Town
description: The anonymous artist appeared to confirm his latest creation in Borodyanka, a town that was among the first to be hit by Russian airstrikes.
dc:creator: McKenna Oxenden

media:content.media:credit: Genya Savilov/Agence France-Presse â€” Getty Images
media:content.media:description: A Banksy mural on the wall of a destroyed building in Borodyanka, near Kyiv, on Saturday.
